pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 4, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 4, 2016:

Calgary

1:00 p.m.  Prime Minister Trudeau will visit the Tsuut'ina First Nation where he will be honoured in a traditional Feather Hat Transfer Ceremony.

Grey Eagle Resort and Casino
3777 Grey Eagle Drive
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Relations: 613-957-5555
